title: #324: VICTIM F Part 7 - Nicole Weisensee Egan
description:
Investigative reporter and co-author of the book “Victim F”, Nicole Weisensee Egan deep dives into the tactics used against Aaron when he was interrogated by police. Jim and Laura are shocked that the detective who handled this case so badly actually received the “Law Enforcement Officer of the Year” Award that year. Jim weighs in with what he thinks was going on with the initial police investigation.  Laura reads a reprehensible quote that Detective Matt Mustard said to Denise’s mother and also points out that the misogynistic attitudes evidenced by some in the Vallejo police should disqualify them from dealing with vulnerable victims.


LINK TO VICTIM F BOOK

https://amzn.to/3fPBbo2


You can hear the links used in this episode in their entirety here:


https://abc7news.com/gone-girl-kidnapping-case-vallejo-kidnap-hoax-matthew-muller/1335950/


https://abcnews.go.com/2020/video/police-cast-doubt-aaron-quinns-story-denise-huskins-78095427


We are so thankful for our sponsors. Please do take a look at what special offers they have for our listeners.


WILD ALASKAN COMPANY  - delivers high quality, sustainably-sourced Wild-Caught Seafood right to your door. Each shipment contains premium wild-caught, individually wrapped portions of delicious seafood that’s ready to prepare and easy to cook. Wild Alaskan Company seafood is how nature intended it to be. Always wild, never farmed or modified, and it contains no antibiotics. 

And right now you can get $15 off your 1st box of premium seafood when you visit www.wildalaskancompany.com/REALCRIME. Make sure to use our URL to let them know that we sent you!

BEST FIENDS - Need a mental coffee break? Love keeping your mind sharp? Download the 5 star-rated puzzle game, Best Fiends today on the App Store or Google Play. That's FRIENDS without the R - Best Fiends!


SUPPORT OUR OTHER SHOWS! 


CRIME ANALYST - This week Laura interviews Amanda Knox. This is an episode that you will not want to miss. Drops Friday 20 August. www.crime-analyst.com

THE FIRST WIFE: John Meehan’s Reign of Terror. Check out Laura’s new podcast about Tonia Bales who was married to John Meehan long before the world came to know him as “Dirty John”. Available exclusively on Audible: https://adbl.co/3BjteRc


KILLER CASTING PODCAST - Coming up, Lisa takes on “The Cosby Show” with brilliant actress/director/producer Aisha Tyler. They talk about “The Cosby Show’s” influence on our culture, the depiction of the female characters…and how it was a mass grooming tool for Cosby to get away with his offenses for so long.  Tune into https://www.killercastingpod.com/podcast or SUBSCRIBE to wherever you listen to your podcasts including Apple Podcasts, https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/killer-casting/id1537283659

Spotify and Stitcher. 


AMERICA'S MOST WANTED - 

America’s Most Wanted is BACK, with Elizabeth Vargas hosting and Jim Clemente as an Executive Producer. You can stream it right now on Fox. . https://www.fox.com/americas-most-wanted/

BEST CASE WORST CASE

Be sure and check out Jim’s podcast Best Case/Worst Case that he does along with former Federal Prosecutor Francey Hakes. Join them as they go behind police lines with unparalleled access to law enforcement officers, looking back at their most memorable cases – for better or for worse. Subscribe now!

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/best-case-worst-case/id1240002929
